rules_text:
Blockbuster 3 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap three untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Target creature you control gains trample and haste until end of turn. If this spell is a blockbuster, each creature you control gains trample and haste until end of turn instead.
Draw a card.
